page.title: 12Wimbledon news w/e 090685
page.content: Refugees from Sri-Lanka have been given shelter at the Hindu Temple in Effra Road,Wimbledon.They would be in danger if they returned home. Actress June Whitfield,a Wimbledon resident for twenty years,received an O.B.E. in the Queen's birthday honours list. A fifty-eight year old housewife was attacked on a bus and robbed of her purse and some jewellery. In a raid on a Wimbledon warehouse thieves stole Â£18,500 worth of televisions and video cassettes. A burglar carried out eleven break ins in just one afternoon,despite this crime is said to have been cut by five per cent in Wimbledon compared with 1985. A new transport system for the disabled which is by the GLC and voluntary donation has just begun.
